name: Bombini (EaseGames, Aaaltonen)
description:
Play as two children and try to escape a dungeon filled with enemies and traps. Use bombs to break a way out but be careful not to get hit yourselves!

Features:

  • 20 levels
  • powerups
  • different enemies and traps

Controls:

Player1: WASD & space

Player2: arrow keys & right ctrl
